work.title: Backend Intern
description: **•** Joined Ezlearn as a Backend Django **Intern** in April, 2025.
**•** Started my work with **optimizing** the load on several **API endpoints**.
**•**  Helped in creating a **simpler and more efficient course purchase flow**.
**•**  Also implemented several **high-quality features** to enhance the **user experience**.

work.title: AppDev Intern
description: **•** Helped in creating mobile app for clients using React Native.
**•**  Worked on several features and bug fixes in the app.
**•**  Got to learn a lot about mobile app development and its challenges.
